page.title: 09Richmond, North Yorkshire. 3
page.content: The museum located so uniquely in the walls of{Trinity Church}is that of the Regiment of the{Green Howards}, formed in 1688, which has had its home in {Richmond}since 1873. There you will see a fine display of uniforms, head- dresses, china and silver plate. { Richmond Comprehensive School}is based on the 16th century {Richmond {Grammar School},which numbered {Lewis Carroll}(Charles Dodgson) of {'Alice in Wonderland'}fame amongst its former pupils. { Richmond}was formerly the head of a large honour from which many princes took the title of duke. One of them, Henry, Earl of Richmond, later became {King Henry VII}. { James Herriot},the well known author, is a great admirer of{Richmond}.He wrote, 'It is the most romantic and charming town in all England'.
